stories.title: The end of “click to subscribe/call to cancel”? This tactics is illegal FTC says

stories.text:
In my Web 3.0 journey I have been curating resources to understand the ecosystem a lot more. Here are 10 really cool tools to begin exploring. Follow the link below for the full 200

1.OpenZepplin - Provides security products to build, automate, and operate decentralised applications.

2.Remix - Remix IDE allows developing, deploying and administering smart contracts for Ethereum like blockchains.

3.Truffle - A world class environment, testing framework and asset pipeline for blockchain using the Ethereum Virtual Machine (EVM), aiming to make life as a developer easier.

4.Hardhat - Hardhat is an Ethereum development environment. Compile your contracts and run them on a development network.

5.DAOStack - DAOStack is an open-source project advancing the technology and adoption of decentralised governance.

6.Katalyo Defi - Crosschain no-code protocol for building DeFi application.

7.Pixura - All the tools you need to launch your non-fungible token marketplace, no coding required.

8.Harmony Grants - Harmony Grants are to drive our platform's mainnet utility, decentralised community, and cryptographic innovations.

9.VoxEdit - VoxEdit is a game changer for voxel artists looking to animate, being the only dedicated voxel editor that features skeletal rigging and timeline animation.

10.Onramper - Allow your users to buy crypto without leaving your app/website. Earn on every transaction and monetize your audience with our on-ramp.

There are so many more amazing tools... https://previewer.adalo.com/db941d87-4790-4de2-bf73-d8d8e4b11291/?source=pwa
